=============================
dime
=============================

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dime.svg
  :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/dime

Virtual Desktop time tracker


.. code-block:: bash

     _ _           
   _| |_|_____ ___ 
  | . | |     | -_|
  |___|_|_|_|_|___|
                 

  Asked for last 1 day(s)
  From : 00:00 - 12, Mar 2017

  [Oldest record : 03:57 - 13, Mar 2017]

  ╒═══════════╤════════════╕
  │ Desktop   │ HH:MM:SS   │
  ╞═══════════╪════════════╡
  │ Main      │ 0:05:01    │
  ╘═══════════╧════════════╛
